definition: variant of 原來|原来[yuan2 lai2]
currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: The boundary integral equation is discretized using constant and linear boundary elements.
sentences.chinese: 邊界積分方程分別用常數和線性邊界元來離散。

sentences.english: But you need to come up with $6 a month for the premium games.
sentences.chinese: 但是你需要每個月花美金6元來使用這些遊戲。

sentences.english: The man offered 500 yuan for this red horse.
sentences.chinese: 那人出價500元來買這匹紅馬。

sentences.english: They took 1000 dollars for the house.
At university we need at least 300 yuan to cover the board expenses.
sentences.chinese: 在大學我們至少需要300元來支付伙食費。

definition: lit. to return the jade annulus to Zhao (idiom); fig. to return something intact to its rightful owner
to repay a debt in kind or by labor
lit. both sleeves flowing in the breeze (idiom); having clean hands/uncorrupted/unsoiled by corrupt practices
to save on food and clothing (idiom); to live frugally
see 每況愈下|每况愈下[mei3 kuang4 yu4 xia4]
